daily_fact: The New York Social Diary recently highlighted the inspiring stories of local artists and entrepreneurs who are creatively transforming their communities, showcasing resilience and innovation in the face of challenges.
topline_md: New York City faces cold weather, suspended express train services, and a ruling against its climate law, while community groups rally for housing proposals and public safety reforms, as nearly 3 million residents risk losing SNAP benefits next month.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Cold temperatures expected in NYC; residents should prepare for winter conditions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
